# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="1563c-102">In email và lịch trong Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1563c-103">Để in thư email:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="1563c-104">Chọn thư bạn muốn in.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1563c-105">Ở góc trên cùng bên phải của thư, chọn ba chấm</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="1563c-106">rồi chọn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="1563c-107">**In**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1563c-108">Để in lịch của bạn:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="1563c-109">Ở góc trên cùng bên phải của trang, chọn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="1563c-110">**In**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1563c-111">Chọn phạm vi xem và thời gian, rồi chọn **in**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1563c-112">Tìm hiểu thêm về cách [in email và lịch trong Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1563c-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
